activities.text: David Troxell receives an Honorable Mention in the <a href=
Congratulations to Siavash Tabrizian on successfully defending his dissertation entitled "Sampling-based algorithms for two-stage stochastic programs and applications."

New manuscript titled "Change Point Detection in Nonstationary Sub-Hourly Wind Time Series" is now available. Project led by Sakitha and in collaboration with Prof. Raanju Sundararajan (SMU-Statistics).

Paper entitled "Stochastic Dynamic Linear Programming: A Sequential Sampling Algorithm for Multistage Stochastic Linear Programming" accepted for publication in SIAM Journal on Optimization. Joint work with Prof. Suvrajeet Sen (USC).
Sakitha defends his dissertaion proposal titled "A Study of Stochastic Market Clearing: New Formulations and Methods."

Paper entitled "Stochastic Market Operation for Coordinated Transmission and Distribution Systems" accepted for publication in IEEE Transactions on Sustainable Energy. Joint work with Gabriel Yin and Prof. Jianhui Wang (SMU-EE).
Niloofar receives the inaugural fellowship in Computational Science and Engineering awarded by Center for Research Computing and the Moody School of Graduate and Advanced Studies at SMU.
New manuscript with David and Prof. Ahn (SMU-OREM) titled "A Cardinality Minimization Approach to Security-Constrained Economic Dispatch" is now online.
New paper on statistical estimation of operating reserves
New manuscript on multistage stochastic programming algorithm
New manuscript on stochastic hierarchical planning in power systems
Random cost SD paper accepted for publication in IJoC.
XV International Conference on Stochastic Programming 2019, Trondheim
